alert.note: Alert for Becker; Clay; Mahnomen; Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 5:59AM CDT until May 29 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clay County in northwestern Minnesota... Eastern Norman County in northwestern Minnesota... Western Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 558 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Syre, or 30 miles northwest of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Flom around 605 AM CDT. Twin Valley around 610 AM CDT. Faith around 615 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Waukon, Mahnomen, Bejou, Ranum and northwestern White Earth Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
